name: WhiteBall Consulting
tag_list: asset-manager-selection, rfp, screening-rfp, investor, institutional, investment-manager, asset-manager, search, tender, equity, fixed-income, real-estate, pqq, rfi
overview:
WhiteBall.org is a investment manager selection platform that brings Institutional Investor and Asset Manager together.

WhiteBall provides Institutional Investors with easy to use web-based software to compose RFPs and a straightforward online platform to conduct their Investment Manager Selection Process.

On the WhiteBall platform Institutional Investor can launch their searches for mandates in the form of screening RFPs or comprehensive RFPs.

It is our aim to facilitate the Investment Manager search throughout the entire process. Therefore, WhiteBall offers pre-formulated questions that can be composed to an individual RFP that meets the requirements from the Investor.
